thread.section_title: Hotel Chandler - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Good location, comfortablewere
thread.title_full: Good location, comfortablewere - Review of Hotel Chandler, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: mairfair
title: Good location, comfortablewere
text: This was a very nice place to stay. The rooms were tiny, and I wished there had been a bathtub too, but the shower was a good size and had beautiful and clean tiling on floor. Room service was good and fast. Location was good. I liked the shutters on the windows too. Very comfortable stay.
